clinical_study.brief_title: Randomized, Parallel, Comparison, Double-Blind Efficacy & Safety Study of APROVEL Versus Placebo in Chinese Patients With Hypertensive Type II Diabetic Patients With Microalbuminuria
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Parallel, Comparison, Double-Blind Efficacy & Safety Study of APROVEL Versus Placebo in Chinese Patients With Hypertensive Type II Diabetic Patients With Microalbuminuria

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the effects and safety of irbesartan on proteinuria in hypertensive patients with type â…¡diabetes mellitus.

secondary_outcome.measure: SeSBP, SeDBP, Total cholesterol, Triglycerides, HDL cholesterol, LDL cholesterol , glycated hemoglobin

intervention.description: Irbesartan capsules strength 150 mg. Irbesartan group will be initiated at one irbesartan and one placebo for 2 weeks and titrated at two capsules if well tolerated after 2 weeks , this dose will be maintained throughout the study without further dose-adjustment (2 capsules daily in the morning will be taken from randomization to study end)
Placebo group: 2 placebo capsules daily as a single morning intake
